lines.text: I like Emmanuelle very much... but there are things about you two I can't bring myself to accept. You play around with love.
If you mean to - to accuse us of sleeping with whomever we want - yes, we play around.
No, there's no danger in going to bed with someone, but falling in love with them - that can be dangerous. Let me tell you a secret - I don't love Laura, I love Emmanuelle.
Supposing one day you happen to fall in love?
I'll admit, there's that risk, but... I happen to like risks, as Emmanuelle does.
Certainly; I don't hide anything. Don't you think that's the way a couple should be?
No lying to each other, even by omission. I've no rights over Emmanuelle - if it pleases her, it pleases me.
